pages.title: Cave Lion
pages.text: Phylogenetic analysis of fossil bone samples revealed that it was highly distinct and genetically isolated from the modern lion ($(o)Panthera leo$()) occurring in Africa and Central Asia.

pages.title: Cave Lion
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Daytime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:beef$(br2)Number of Offspring: 2$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
